title: Minister of Foreign Affairs takes part in the 1st meeting of the "decade of African roots and diasporas" initiative
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr. Sabri Boukadoum took part on Thursday in the first meeting of the African Union (AU) High Level Committee for implementing the initiative “Decade of African Roots and Diasporas”(2021-2031).

This meeting comes in application of decision n° 807 of the summit of heads of state and government of the AU, adopted at its 34th session held virtually last February and which provides for the establishment of a legal framework to strengthen the participation of African migrants and populations of African origin in the sustainable development of the continent and in the achievement of the objectives of Agenda 2063 and sustainable development 2030.
